attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: GLCpSlsUDb = if(current >= GLCpPlanStartI, if(current == 11 && GLCpPlanStartI == -1, GLCpSlsUl2, GLCpSlsUl0), GLCpSlsUl1)

attribute.name: formula
attribute.value: GLCpSlsRLDb = if(current >= GLCpPlanStartI, if(current == 11 && GLCpPlanStartI == -1, GLCpSlsRLl2, GLCpSlsRLl0), GLCpSlsRLl1)
